thread.title: Trans Global Group Inc (TGGI) Stock Message Board | InvestorsHub
thread.title_full: Trans Global Group Inc (TGGI) Stock Message Board | InvestorsHub

author: William777
text: Nutranomics has developed over 850 nutritional food and supplement product formulas for some of the world's largest direct marketing companies. Based on the success of these formulas, Nutranomics has established its own retail product line to provide quality health and wellness products to consumers outside of the direct marketing space that could be used for TGGI in 'Buy Free Life'.. There was once positive news from UK and Asia. New management could find value here. 2024 will be interesting. The 'Plant' was a big mistake. Can management clean up its act? We will see. This is the OTC. Remember when TGGI was .0001?
